article_title: Memorial Hermann announces Cypress medical center
article_text:
Memorial Hermann announces Cypress medical center

The region's hospital building boom continues, with Memorial Hermann Health System saying Thursday that it intends to build a "substantial" medical center on 32 acres off U.S. 290 and near the Grand Parkway in Cypress.

article_metadata.description: The region's hospital building boom continues, with Memorial Hermann Health System saying Thursday that it intends to build a "substantial" medical center on 32 acres off U.S. 290 and near the Grand Parkway in Cypress.  The announcement of a land purchase comes as the health system prepares for a $650 million expansion and renovation at its flagship hospital in the Texas Medical Center.  Just two weeks ago, Houston Methodist announcing it was launching a pair of multimillion-dollar projects, including a 193-bed hospital in The Woodlands and a major upgrade to its traditional home in the Texas Medical Center.
article_metadata.author.name: By Lora Hines
